text: For the “*Reusable Sections*” it doesn’t look like the class name is 100% managed on a template level, or any thing for that matter. Example, if you decide to add/update a class name on the template, it doesn’t update across all “sections” that’s using this custom reusable section. This makes it hard to make global changes.

It’s not possible to create global sections at this time.

So if you were to update one instance on one page, then add the section to another page, they will not be the same.

Just like if you’ve updated a module default value, it will not force existing pages with that module to overwrite the current value.
We are interested in global sections being a thing one day. We’re just not there yet. We have some other challenges we’re solving first.
